#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;
char ST[200];
char* fn(int );
int main(){
int x,i,y,j,k;
char ch;

cin>>x;
i=0;
    while(i<x){
    cin>>y;
    char *st;
    st=fn(y);
    //strcat(ST,st);
    cout<<st<<endl;
    strcpy(ST,"");
    i++;
    }

 return 0;
}
char* fn(int y){
    int c;
    if(y-25>0){
    char *st1;
    st1=fn(y-25);
    //cout<<st<<endl;
    }
    if(y<=25)c=y;
    else c=25;
    char st[c+2];
    st[c+1]='\0';
    int j=0;
    char ch='a';
    while(j<=c){
        st[c-j]=ch;
        ch++;
        j++;
    }
    strcat(ST,st);
    //cout<<st<<"   "<<"recurrence "<<c<<endl;
    return ST;

}
